headline: Jim Cramer on Truist: “I Would Hang On to This One”
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE:TFC) is one of the 16 stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. A caller asked Cramer’s opinion of the company, and he replied: “You know, I am really surprised that Truist is doing badly as it is. I think it’s a pretty good situation. I would, I would hang on to this one. […]
